metrics_conclusion: The Family Madrigal has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Family Madrigal has sections analyzed in the following keys: D♭ Major, C♯ Mixolydian,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
